Rules.ErrorMessage: One or more adjust rules failed.
Rules.Expression: input.Name == "Staphylococcus Aureus" AND input.Antibiograms.Where(antibiotigram => antibiotigram.Antibiotic == "Oxacilin" && antibiotigram == "R")
